updateMessage:
## Update available
We have made some updates to Courses in AmaraHealth. Please update the app to enjoy the updates.
changelog:
## What's new in AmaraHealth™?
**Courses**\
Discover our simple, step-by-step courses with built-in progress tracking, designed to help you learn at your own pace – all within the ease and convenience of the app.\
\
**App Icon**\
We have added support for iOS 18 app icon customisation and themed Icon for Android 13+
